org.hibernate.bytecode.enhance.internal.javassist

Class PersistentAttributesHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hibernate.bytecode.enhance.internal.javassist.PersistentAttributesHelper

  • public class PersistentAttributesHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    util methods to fetch attribute metadata. consistent for both field and property access types.
    See Also:
    ReflectHelper
